PARENT STATEMENT

How do you hope that Saint Stanislaus can help your son and your family?*

What do you believe your son might contribute to the Saint Stanislaus school community?*

If there are additional details or comments you wish to share with us about your son, please do so here.

RECOMMENDATIONS

Name of Reference #1*

First Last

Please share two school officials who can complete recommendation forms for your son.

School*

Title*

Email*

Phone

Name of Reference #2*

First Last

School*

Title*

Email*

Phone

RELEASE OF INFORMATION

I, the undersigned, do hereby request that you release to Saint Stanislaus an unofficial copy of the following school records for my son.

Student’s Name*

First Last

Please supply as much of the following information as possible: *Grades and credits received for the current year and all previous years while enrolled; *Discipline record for the current year and all previous years while enrolled; *Standardized test scores; *Recommendation form filled out by a teacher, counselor, or principal; *Special Needs Recommendation if applicable (IEP, 504, etc.).

I also authorize Saint Stanislaus to contact you by phone, email, fax, or mail to request other information about my son’s academic and discipline history.

A prompt response to this request is appreciated.

First and Last Name of Parent/Guardian*

First Last

Electronic Signature Agreement

By selecting the “I Consent” button, you are signing this Agreement electronically. You agree your electronic signature is the legal equivalent of your manual signature on this Agreement. By selecting “I Accept” you consent to be legally bound by this Agreement’s terms and conditions. You further agree that your use of a key pad, mouse or other device to select an item, button, icon or similar act/action, or to otherwise provide Saint Stanislaus or in accessing or making any transaction regarding any agreement, acknowledgement, consent terms, disclosures or conditions constitutes your signature (hereafter referred to as “E-Signature”), acceptance and agreement as if actually signed by you in writing. You also agree that no certification authority or other third party verification is necessary to validate your E-Signature and that the lack of such certification or third party verification will not in any way affect the enforceability of your E-Signature or any resulting contract between you and Saint Stanislaus

Consent*

I do hereby request that you release to Saint Stanislaus my son’s school records including courses and grades, test scores, written evaluations, attendance records, and other requested documents. I also authorize Saint Stanislaus to contact you by phone, email, fax, or mail to request other information about my son’s academic and discipline history.
